author: aheritier
msg: MAVEN-1755 : Backward Incompability : Usage of xml entities in the POM doesn't work in maven 1.1 beta 1 & 2
Upgrade to a maven-model 3.0.2 SNAPSHOT which allow us to read the POM from an URL with DOM4J
It fixes the problem of relative entities. We have to check if it doesn't reduce significantly performances.

author: aheritier
msg: MAVEN-1755 : New maven-model using dom4j as reader.

author: ajborley
msg: Added deploy scripts for the BigBank sample & updated the VC7 build for it. Also updated VC7 build for Calculator to use the deploy scripts. Also updated the sample readme.html files to reflect new deployment structure

author: geirm
msg: Improve implementation of invocation API to be spec compliant.
DestroyJavaVM is partially implemented.  Also did updates for cunit
Note that there remains some instability in the unit tests, but
Also includes one-line change to test_ti_instrum, added
